messages.content: Hey, this is James, a pharmacist with the Walgreens on Towersville Road and Cincinnati 8th Road, and we just got robbed.
Okay, what do they look like?
We'll have it all on video camera. Gentleman about 6'2, short hair, white glasses, in gray sweatpants, I think a brown shirt.
What kind of shirt, brown shirt?
Yeah, he just cleared out all of my oxycontin and morphine.
I'm thinking he's still in the store. He shouldn't be out by now.
Did he have a gun or anything?
I don't really know. It might not have been real, but he jumped over the counter and I wasn't going to argue.
Okay, why do you think he's still in the store?
Because he just jumped back over the counter.
